mapper.select: SELECT wno, namekor, poster, seller, (SELECT nickname FROM wine_member WHERE wine.seller=wine_member.userid) as nickname FROM wine WHERE namekor LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' AND seller=#{id}

SELECT wno, namekor, nameeng, type, poster, maker, grape, nation, nickname FROM( SELECT w.wno, w.namekor, w.nameeng, w.type, w.poster, (SELECT m.namekor FROM maker m WHERE m.no = w.maker) AS maker, (SELECT LISTAGG(g.namekor, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY g.namekor DESC) FROM (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(w.grape, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) AS grape_no FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(w.grape, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL) t JOIN grape g ON t.grape_no = g.no) AS grape, (SELECT LISTAGG(n.namekor, ' | ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY n.namekor DESC) FROM (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(w.nation, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) AS nation_no FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(w.nation, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL) t JOIN nation n ON t.nation_no = n.no) AS nation, wm.nickname FROM wine w JOIN wine_member wm ON w.seller=wm.userid ORDER BY wno DESC) WHERE (type LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' OR grape LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' OR nation LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' OR namekor LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' OR maker LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' OR nickname LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%') AND rownum<=6

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wine w JOIN wine_member wm ON w.seller=wm.userid WHERE type LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' OR grape LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' OR nation LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' OR namekor LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' OR maker LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' OR nickname LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%'

SELECT wno, namekor, type, poster, maker, grape, nation, nickname, state, nameeng, type, price, vol, sugar, acid, body, tannin, aroma, food, alcohol, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday num FROM (SELECT wno, namekor, type, poster, maker, grape, nation, nickname, state, nameeng, type, price, vol, sugar, acid, body, tannin, aroma, food, alcohol, regdate, rownum as num FROM (SELECT w.wno, w.namekor, w.nameeng, w.type, w.poster, (SELECT m.namekor FROM maker m WHERE m.no = w.maker) AS maker, (SELECT LISTAGG(g.namekor, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY g.namekor DESC) FROM (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(w.grape, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) AS grape_no FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(w.grape, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL) t JOIN grape g ON t.grape_no = g.no) AS grape, (SELECT LISTAGG(n.namekor, ' | ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY n.namekor DESC) FROM (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(w.nation, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) AS nation_no FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(w.nation, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL) t JOIN nation n ON t.nation_no = n.no) AS nation, wm.nickname, w.nameeng, w.type, w.price, w.vol, w.sugar, w.acid, w.body, w.tannin, w.aroma, w.food, w.alcohol, w.regdate FROM wine w JOIN wine_member wm ON w.seller=wm.userid ORDER BY wno DESC )) WHERE (num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) AND state=9
